[[inst_hl_prfi_ua]]
==== HL.PRFI.UA

*Syntax:* hl.prfi.ua{.l1,.l2,.l3} [SrcL, simm], ->{t, u, Rd}

*Description:* Prefetch instruction for cache hint. Provides a hint to the processor that the specified memory location is likely to be accessed soon.

*Encoding:*

image::../generated/encodings/enc_hl_prfi_ua.svg[HL.PRFI.UA encoding,width=800]

*Group:* LDA
